Nestled down a quiet street in the heart of cosmopolitan Seminyak, lies Casa Brio, a stunning four-bedroom villa. Surrounded by a peaceful and beautifully manicured tropical garden, it’s hard to believe that this spacious, contemporary villa lies within walking distance of the best that Bali has to offer.

Splash in the sparkling 21-metre-long pool or relax on a sun lounger with an ice cold drink. Everything is possible at Casa Brio, where you are looked after around the clock by a team of charming and professional staff who will arrange sunset cocktails on the rooftop terrace, indulgent dinners in the semi-alfresco dining pavilion, and make sure that all your holiday wishes are met.

listing.listing_description:
Caribbean style meets Indonesian influence at The Cotton House. Bright, breezy and utterly chic, this Bali vacation rental brings inspiration from across the globe into its tucked-away location in Seminyak. A full staff and seven bedrooms mean the property can accommodate up to fourteen guests in tropical luxury.

Open the villa’s bright blue doors and step into your own private haven away from the bustle of the town. Its four pavilions are laid out across more than 6,000 square feet of lush lawn—perfect for hosting a family reunion or even a destination wedding—with a wet-edge pool, hidden plunge pool, plenty of loungers, a barbecue and al-fresco dining for fourteen. Inside the pavilions, you’ll find amenities like a media room, bar, pool table and exercise room. Your holiday also includes an airport transfer and the services of a chef, butler, housekeeper, villa manager, and car and driver.

With living and dining areas in three of the four pavilions and nearly 15,000 square feet of living space, there’s ample room to relax quietly or gather all together. Architect Hetta Thynne took cues from the great houses of the Caribbean when planning the pitched roofline, rows of French doors and colonnaded walkways; the tropical elegance continues inside in a mix of vintage and modern furnishings, and bold patterns. Though chef service is included, a fully equipped kitchen is available.

The eight bedrooms at The Cotton House are divided among two pavilions: five bedrooms in one, two in the other. There are six bedrooms with king beds, including three honeymoon-worthy suites with al-fresco showers, and two bedroom with two twin beds. All eight bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

A location in the heart of Seminyak puts you close to an array of restaurants, shopping at Seminyak Square and activities like the kid-friendly waterslides and trampolines at Finns Recreation Club. Don’t miss the chance to explore the four popular beaches within a 6-mile drive, from Petitenget to Seminyak to Canggu.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Dine alfresco from the grill, lounge by your private pool, and stroll to Belongil Beach to play in the surf. Part of the six-villa Kaylani Beach House complex, this family-friendly home offers comfortable living and dining areas, a gourmet kitchen, and high-end media technology. Walk 10 minutes for an evening on Byron Bay town, and explore the otherworldly landscapes of Arakwal National Park.

High walls of natural wood paneling create a cloistered, private space for outdoor enjoyments. Savor the brilliant sunlight on lounge chairs and plunge into the pool. Fire up the grill in the afternoon and gather for alfresco in the gentle breeze off the nearby bay.

The great room opens to the deck through sliding glass doors, allowing the home to breathe the beach-scented air. This open-concept space features a lounge with smart TV, a sleek contemporary kitchen with breakfast bar, and a second dining table of beautiful natural wood. Luminous white walls harmonize with light natural wood accents and a sea-inspired palette of greens and blues.

The two-floor villa features a pair of large suites with queen beds and ensuite bathrooms, as well as two guestrooms that share a bathroom and lounge area. The twin beds in one of the guestrooms can be combined into a split-king, and there are two additional twin-size beds in the overflow room. All of the rooms have air conditioning and ceiling fans.

Kaylani Beach Houses are ideally positioned for experiencing the unique and manifold pleasures of Australia’s easternmost extremity—from the pubs and eateries of Byron Bay town, to the sands of Tallow Beach, to the pristine shores of Cape Byron State Conservation Area.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Relaxed island living awaits at Champion Ridge #17. Set in a lush garden and laid out around a natural stone pool, the five-bedroom villa feels like a private oasis. But its location in the exclusive Champion Ridge community on the Mauna Lani Resort grounds means it’s close to shopping, dining, golf and two of the Big Island’s best beaches.

The heart of the villa is a beautiful courtyard with a covered porch and a stone pool and hot tub connected by a waterfall. An outdoor kitchen has a built-in gas barbecue and pass-through to the indoor kitchen, and the adjacent dining area is perfect for afternoon snacks or al-fresco dinners. A separate covered lanai has a lounge area surrounded by pretty flowering shrubs and palms. Your stay at Champion Ridge #17 includes access to the Mauna Lani Beach Club, and the resort also offers golf and tennis clubs and spa facilities if you wish to indulge.

A single-story layout, fold-back doors to the lanai, wood trim and designer furnishings with natural textures make the villa’s interiors feel like an extension of the garden. In the living and dining room, a rattan coffee table, grasscloth-covered ceiling and woven blinds are staples of tropical decor, while plump sofas and armchairs make room for the whole family. There’s a more formal dining area adjacent to the living room, as well as a more casual spot that’s open to the outdoors. The fully equipped kitchen, situated between the two dining areas, has a breakfast bar and gourmet stainless steel appliances.

There is one bedroom in the main house at Champion Ridge #17; the other four are in a guest house. The main-house bedroom is a master suite with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and al-fresco shower. There are three more master suites in the guest house: two with king beds and one with a queen bed, and all with en-suite bathrooms and private entrances. The fifth bedroom has two twin beds and its own private entrance.

From the Champion Ridge private community, it’s a 17-minute walk to the restaurants and shopping, including a grocery store, at Mauna Lani. By car, it’s just 3 minutes to Mauna Lani Beach Club, 4 minutes to the Mauna Lani fitness center and Francis H. I’i Brown Golf Course, and 11 minutes to the white sands of Hapuna Beach. If you’d like to see more of the Big Island during your stay, spend an afternoon in Waimea, 18 miles away, or Kona, 29 miles away. Fly to another island—or back to the mainland—via Kona International Airport, a 22-mile drive from the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Escape to the ultimate golfing hideaway in New Zealand’s unspoiled interior. Deftly incorporated into the rambling Kinloch estate golf course – designed by legend Jack Nicklaus – this listing provides direct access to this stunning lakeside course. Surrounded on all sides by pine forests and grasslands of the wild Taupo region, experience immersion in recreational bliss and natural splendor.

Kinloch offers a warm welcome on the shores of Lake Taupo, the North Island’s greatest freshwater lake. With a commanding view of the fairway of this celebrated course, returning guests will pass into a regal stone courtyard, offering total privacy and ambience as a nearby firepit crackles. Choose to begin the day with breakfast on the viewpoint terrace, surrounded by birdsong as a gentle wind flows from the nearby forest, or curl up in the warm interior of the villa with a book and simply watch the weather pass. You’re never more than a short walk from an absorbing day activity; like spending an enriching day in Kinloch’s renowned solar spa, shaking things up with a lakeside mountain bike outing, or taking on a tennis match in the one of the estate’s complementary courses.  

From Kinloch, day-trip options range in every direction. Visit the vibrant nearby town of Taupo and enjoy the finest and freshest NZ cuisine at excellent local restaurants. Follow the Waikato river north, and wander amongst the steaming clouds of the Craters of the Moon geothermal walkways. Reforge a connection with the living environment via the naturally-heated pools of the Wairakei spa, one of New Zealand’s very finest outdoor day retreats, or simply take off for a drive amongst the hills and forests, ranging to the far side of Taupo as the splendor of 4 natural parks stretch for miles in every direction.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
You’ll be sure to leave the hustle and bustle of everyday life behind you when you stay at this tranquil vacation home. Surrounded by mature trees and lush tropical greenery, this estate offers plenty of space to relax in private, making it one of our top Bali villas for a group of couples. A top tropical holiday destination, the island of Bali offers a welcoming atmosphere, unique culture and stunning beaches.

Relax in the sun on one of the cushioned chaise lounges that surround the 12-meter, greenstone swimming pool. Later, enjoy a massage in one of the relaxation balés or sit with a glass of wine and breathe in the tropical air in the garden living area. Included with your stay are the services of a chef and a housekeeper, ensuring you won’t have to lift a finger.

The heart of the villa is its open-sided thatched roof dining pavilion that features a solid wood dining table on a polished concrete floor; beside it you’ll find a casual living area with rattan sofas. Meals are prepped in the fully equipped kitchen that also includes a service bar. And if you’re looking for a communal space to unwind with a movie, there’s a second, open-sided pavilion with sofas that face a satellite television and DVD player.

This property offers six stand-alone bedrooms, allowing up to 12 guests to spend the night here and experience plenty of privacy. All suites have king size beds and en-suite bathrooms with rain showers as well as televisions and patios, while three rooms also include access to plunge pools.

You’re just 8 km to Echo Beach when you stay here—this spot is ideal for surfing and is known for its dark, volcanic sands. Meanwhile, the high-end boutiques, trendy restaurants and vibrant club spots of Seminyak are just 16 km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sapphire Seas is the ultimate Maui getaway where sand meets sea, indoor meets outdoor and tasteful meets traditional. The beautiful four-bedroom villa sits up against a stretch of golden sand in Maui’s Kihei region, known for its authentic take on Hawaiian life.

An immense free-form pool anchors the lovely tiled terrace displaying a stunning vista through majestic palm trees to the sparkling blue Pacific Ocean. Rattan deck chairs line the pool, allowing you to enjoy the warm island sun. The home is perfect for entertaining, as a spacious lanai houses a wet bar, barbecue and an elegant alfresco dining table that seats eight. As the sun begins to set, light the tiki torches and move your guests out onto the carefully manicured lawn for cocktails. Ease into the bubbling hot tub and relax under the stars.

Retractable walls blur the lines between inside and out, as fresh air and light spill into the great room. Traditional materials blend with modern design in this open-plan room where you can look up and discover tropical woven matting decorating the ceiling or marvel at the refined furnishings made from native woods. The plush sofas, adorned with floral cushions surround a large flatscreen TV and tasteful coffee table. You’ll get to test your culinary skills in an incredible gourmet kitchen, overflowing with chef appointed appliances and accessories.

A staircase, decorated with beautiful carved railings, leads you up the the spacious Master suite. There you’ll find a king size bed, walk-in closet and a huge veranda with seating and an ocean view. Its large ensuite bathroom contains fixtures that would rival any spa, including a jetted tub and dual-head shower. The other three individually styled bedrooms are on the ground floor, each with its own ensuite. All bedrooms are air conditioned and feature state-of-the-art entertainment systems.

Kihei is bordered by 6 miles of beachfront, many of which are reef-protected making them ideal for swimming and snorkeling. You’ll be within walking distance of shops, restaurants and a grocery stores. Golfers are minutes from the Maui Nui Golf course while nature lovers can tour the wonders of Maui flora and fauna. Enjoy a drive up the winding road to Haleakala, a dormant volcano, where you can experience an unforgettable sunrise or sunset.

Copyright © 2014 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Permit ID: STKM 2013/1007

HAWAII TAX ID #: TA-122-672-3328-01

listing.listing_description:
With a peerless view of the surf sweeping into Mamala Bay, this suite is less than 10 minutes walk from the sands of famous Waikiki Beach and less than 15 minutes walk from Kahanamoku Beach. With the conveniences and style of a great hotel at your disposal, a stay here will ensure you can mix top-flight comfort with exciting outings to Hawaii’s best natural attractions, on both land and sea.   

The suite includes everything that a small group needs to feel totally at home, with modern, expansive kitchen and dining area, plus a relaxation-focussed living room complete with that enchanting view. Guests can make the most of the marble-lined, walk-in showers and welcoming, soft beds, and are just a few steps away from the other hotel amenities, including the impressive rooftop pool with attached hot tub and sunbathing area, as well as the hotel’s fully-equipped gym and cocktail bar. A cluster of excellent restaurants are hosted by the hotel, offering seasonal Hawaiian offerings as well as world-cuisine; ranging from neoclassical French to the very best of Japanese and Italian dining. 

Strolling through the palm-lined, tropical-meets-modern streets of Waikiki, guests will inevitably be drawn to the nearby beaches, which act as social hubs featuring hula dancing and canoe racing events. With Waikiki being where modern surfing had its genesis, that sporting culture is celebrated here, with figures constantly paddling across the brilliant blue water out to the break. 

Further attractions range from Waikiki aquarium, one of the oldest in the US with hundreds of marine species, to Honolulu zoo, host to a petting zoo as well as tigers, chimps, hippos and regiments of flamingos. After a packed day and delicious poke bowl in a local restaurant, take a leisurely stroll on the seafront, drinking in the view of the sun sinking into a golden sea beyond Diamond Head hill, as you savor the flavor of a fruit-infused shave ice. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

HAWAII TAX ID #:  GE/TA#033-074-4832-01

listing.listing_description:
Whether the aloha spirit or the golf course is calling your name, answer them at Kai Malino Estate 147 - Pakui Street. Part of the exclusive Hualalai Resort on the Big Island of Hawaii, this luxury vacation rental looks over the ninth fairway of the Jack Nicklaus course to the blue waters of the Pacific Ocean. Bring up to six friends or family members to bask on the terrace, play a round or several, or stretch out on the beaches of the Kona-Kohala coast.

Kai Malino Estate 147 - Pakui Street opens to a covered lanai with a sitting area. Read in the shade, or bask in a lounger in the sun. Swim in the private stone-set infinity pool, soak in the hot tub after a day on the golf course and try out local seafood on the gas grill before sitting down to the alfresco dining area. In the evenings, immerse yourself in one of the 3D televisions or play an old favorite on the grand piano. For an additional fee, villa guests can also access the amenities at the Four Seasons Hualalai Resort, from the sports club, spa, and beach and pool services to the ocean activity center and tennis and kids’ clubs.

Step through the villa’s palm-lined courtyard and into a bright, open-plan space that’s filled with warm breezes from a glass wall opening to the lanai. Sand-colored sofas and chairs form an inviting sitting area, while refined bamboo chairs can seat eight around a glass-topped dining table. Prepare a casual breakfast or luau-worthy feast in the fully equipped kitchen, which has sleek wood cabinetry, trendy black countertops and gourmet appliances.

Each of the villa’s three bedrooms has an ensuite bathroom and opens to the courtyard. The master suite, perfect for a romantic getaway or even a tropical honeymoon, has a king bed, walk-in closet and jetted tub, and each of the other two bedrooms has a queen bed. Neutral tones give the bedrooms a soft, serene feel, letting the bold greens and blues of the landscape outside be the focus.

Your stay at Kai Malino Estate 147 - Pakui Street includes the use of two four-person golf carts, making it easy to explore. But you’ll only need your sandals to reach the oceanfront amenities at the beaches at the Hualalai Resort, a 5-minute walk from the villa. Discover Hawaiian cuisine or browse for the perfect souvenir in the restaurants and shops at the Waikoloa Beach Resort, a 15-minute drive away. At the end of your holiday, plan on a 10-minute drive to Kona International Airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

HAWAII TAX ID #: W41383633-01

listing.listing_description:
Designed as a family and friends vacation retreat, Villa Sapi has everything needed for a dream vacation. Enjoy all the comfort and service of a 5 stars hotel, and the feeling of intimacy that only a private house can deliver. Villa Sapi consists of two different structures surrounded by decorative fishponds and gardens flowing all the way down to a pristine white beach.

Almost every room provides panoramic views. The open-plan main room houses the living and dining areas below a lofty ceiling. Light pours in through an invisible wall giving you full appreciation of the tasteful furnishings and colorful, contemporary art. In the living area, a lounging area and soft armchairs with refined upholstery is the perfect setting in which to relax from a day at the beach. The elegant dining set is made of a lovely dark wood and beautifully finished. The gourmet kitchen features deluxe appliances, natural stone surfaces and local Indonesian art. As dusk settles, gather your guests around the covered dining table as your private chef prepares a feast.

The main house acts as a sort of vortex, it's a place to gather, to chill out and enjoy friends and family, but above all it's a place to explore. The guesthouse is a wonderful modern Inner Sanctum. Independent and uniquely isolated from the main villa, it gives your guests the freedom and independence from others if they so desire.

All five bedrooms are individually decorated with fine linens, beautiful furniture and every one features a stunning ocean view. Each bedroom includes a King size bed and an en-suite bathroom with alfresco shower and premium fixtures and fittings that would rival any spa. The Guesthouse, which houses two of the six bedrooms, has an additional private pool and alfresco dining area for its residents.

Lombok, which is known as a more pristine and untouched Bali, offers visitors many unforgettable attractions. The Gili Islands located a short 5-minute boat ride from the villa are known for their scuba diving and snorkeling but also for relaxing, swimming and partying. The second biggest volcano of Indonesia, Mount Rinjani, is not to be missed. Visitors can book guided tours to get to the top and see the Crater Lake. Hang with monkeys at the Pusuk Monkey Forest and take in the beautiful mountainous landscape. Lombok won’t leave you disappointed.

Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Designer furnishings and a thoughtful layout inside Hualalai Resort Haliipua Villa 104 rival the fairway and ocean views outside. Set in a prime central location within the resort, this villa offers easy access to shared luxury amenities, plus beaches, golf and more a short drive away. Reserve this three-bedroom Big Island vacation rental for a laid-back getaway with friends or an island holiday with extended family.

Guests of the Haliipua Villas are welcome to use the resort’s shared pool, golf course, fitness center and spa. Start your day with a cup of local java from the Hualalai Coffee Company, gain insight into Hawaiian traditions at the cultural center or explore your surroundings in the ocean activities program; it’s easy to reach everything in one of the villa’s two included golf carts. Finish the day with dinner from the barbecue on the private lanai, followed by a movie in the villa’s media room.

The villa is laid out around an upper-level great room with an open-plan living and dining area and fully equipped kitchen. Details like a vaulted ceiling and natural-fiber area rugs give the space a breezy appeal that’s only increased by a fold-away glass wall opening to the lanai. There’s also a family room on the lower level that opens to a landscaped courtyard with a tranquil water feature.

All three bedrooms at Haliipua Villa 104 have ensuite bathrooms. There are two bedrooms with alfresco showers and their own terraces: one with a king bed that overlooks the ocean, and one with a queen bed and mountain vistas. The third bedroom has two twin beds, its own terrace and ocean views.

For a honeymoon-style stroll along white sand or to play in the waves, make the 1-mile walk or golf-cart ride from the villa to the beach at the Four Seasons Hualalai. If you’ve rented a car, it’s also a short drive to even more beaches, a selection of golf courses, and dining and shopping in central Kailua-Kona.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Discover the luxury of true indoor-outdoor living at the unique Villa Zelie. Made up of four pavilions set in a terraced garden, this five-bedroom Canggu vacation rental exudes both traditional chic and modern flair. While it feels like a private retreat, a location close to beaches, shopping and dining puts the best of Bali at your doorstep.

Your holiday at Villa Zelie includes the services of a chef, villa manager, housekeeper, gardener and security staff. Spend your stay sampling amenities such as a two-story spa and massage pavilion, an open-air media room with a projector and screen, a bar and Wi-Fi. Or step outside to enjoy the main pool, children’s pool, lounge areas and barbecue.

The villa’s teak and ironwood pavilions are inspired by classic Javanese joglo and gladak houses, with their high roofs and open sides, and water features create the illusion that the garden extends inside. But the furnishings, carefully selected by the property’s Parisian owner, an interior designer, exude a more modern style in the comfortable lounge, bar and dining areas. Though chef service is included, the villa does have a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

The five bedrooms at Villa Zelie can accommodate groups of up to ten on a family reunion, tropical getaway with friends or even an intimate destination wedding. Each bedroom has a king bed, air conditioning and a terrace, and opens to a semi-outdoor en-suite bathroom to rival that in any honeymoon suite.

The villa’s location between Seminyak and Canggu means you’re only a 2-minute walk from Kayu Putih Beach and the beachfront La Laguna restaurant and bar. It’s also a short walk from Finns Beach Club, right in front of a spectacular surf break, and the water slides, trampolines and more of Finns Recreation Club. Don’t miss sunset at the nearby Tanah Lot Temple or a round or two at the Nirwana Bali golf club.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The vast estate of Villa Atas Ombak includes an acre and a half of gardens and over 100 meters of sandy beachfront, making it easy to see why it earned its name, “villa on top of the waves.” With stylish lounge areas and stunning views, this is one of our grandest Bali villa rentals.

In the middle of the villa’s manicured lawn and facing palm trees and the ocean is the in-ground swimming pool, complete with cushioned chaise lounges and sun umbrellas, making this the perfect spot to while away a hot afternoon. In the evening, cozy up with loved ones and settle down on one of the plush sofas to watch a movie in the television room. You can completely relax during your stay here thanks to the services of on-site housekeeping, kitchen and wait staff.

You’ll find the main living area in a thatched roof pavilion that’s open on all sides, allowing you to fully enjoy the tropical air. This space features cushioned sofas and chairs, an informal dining table and views overlooking the ocean. If you’d like to try your hand at a home-cooked meal, you’ll find the kitchen fully equipped with restaurant standard appliances.

A maximum of 10 guests can comfortably stay overnight in this home’s five bedrooms. Each room includes an en-suite bathroom, king size bed and air conditioning, as well as access to the outdoors. Meanwhile, the spacious master suite opens up to a private plunge pool.

If you can peel yourself away from the villa, you’ll find an assortment of well-known restaurants and shops just five minutes away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This sensational villa is located within Hualalai Resort on the Big Island of Hawaii, an easy walk from the beachfront Four Seasons. Perhaps the finest property bordering the resort's golf course, the 6,300-square-foot home offers expansive outdoor living areas, spacious and elegant interiors, and panoramic views of the lush fairways, Pacific Ocean, and Hawaiian sunset. Five bedrooms include four large king suites (one of which is located in a separate cottage), making Hualalai Estates an ideal vacation rental for family reunions, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up ten in size.

Framed in rich gardens and volcanic rock, the villa harmonizes gracefully with the stunning landscape and sea. Plunge into the refreshing infinite pool and revel in the sunlight on the tanning shelf. Enjoy refreshments in the shade of the lanai and afternoon meals from the barbecue. Kindle the fire pit in the evening breeze and dip into the hot tub under the stars.

Wide, cornerless walls create a seamless, indoor-outdoor living area for relaxing in the ocean breeze, infusing the home's interiors with an alfresco ambiance. A gourmet-grade kitchen with beautiful wood cabinetry and a breakfast bar with superb rattan chairs overlooks the open-concept living and dining areas. The furnishings and decor conjure vintage Hawaiian elegance, enhanced by fine modern amenities for entertainment. Air conditioning and ceiling fans complement the enchanting breath of the Pacific.

The bedrooms include four fabulous king suites and guestroom with two twin-size beds. The three main-house king suites and the cottage suite open to the villa's terrace, and all five rooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms and open-air showers like rain forest cascades. There are gorgeous stone bathtubs in the master bath and the primary guest bath, as well.

Hualalai Estates provides exquisite privacy while placing you in the heart of one of he finest oceanfront resorts in the world, with amenities suited for guests of all ages. Take a lovely walk to the Four Seasons to enjoy its beach, fine restaurants, and extraordinary wellness amenities. Play championship golf at Hualalai or nearby Mauna Lani, and treat yourself to authentic Hawaiian treatments at the spa. Enjoy the fine coffee and vintage soda fountain at Hualalalai Trading Company or an oceanfront meal at Beach Tree.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located on the southwestern coast of Bali, Indonesia’s exotic “Island of the Gods,” Villa Asta is an opulent five-bedroom residence with accommodations for ten lucky visitors. This island has no shortage of beaches, and Villa Asta is placed within walking distance of Batu Belig Beach, best known for its incomparable sunsets. The villa is situated on a tremendous private estate replete with various outdoor features so astonishing, some guests may wish to spend the entirety of their trip exploring and experiencing all that Villa Asta has to offer.

The grounds feature badminton and volleyball courts, not to mention the billiards and table tennis tables as well. There are two different kinds of swimming pools to choose from, and koi ponds surrounded by beautifully manicured gardens will make you think you are in paradise. Indoors, the home has only the best in entertainment technology, total climate control and even massage beds. 

Designed by the internationally renowned architect Guy Morgan, the home is an amazing collection of boldly-colored walls and furniture, contrasted against a strong motif of contemporary elegance. The estate features both indoor and outdoor living and dining areas with long, immaculate sectional couches and dining tables that can seat fourteen. The kitchen comes fully equipped, though the chef will take care of most of the cooking in the adjacent service kitchen.

Full en-suite bedrooms are spread across both the upper and lower floors. The three suites on the lower floor have two twin beds and private entry to the terrace. The master suites on the upper floor have four-poster king size beds, security safes and direct access to the plunge pool. The en-suite bathrooms are luxurious and are all alfresco, though walled gardens ensure complete privacy.

Bali boasts some rare sights that could never be found anywhere else on the planet. The nearby town of Ubud features an ecological reserve known as Sacred Monkey Forest, which houses the precious Balinese long-tailed macaque. For breathtaking and inspirational sights, make sure to visit Pura Luhur Uluwatu, a Hindu Sea Temple placed at the edge of a cliff surrounded by the boundless sea.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Walk barefoot from this oceanside villa to the sands of Broken Head, a favorite beach for families and surfers in the Byron Bay region. Take the villa’s surfboard and conquer one of the top point-breaks in the world. Then return for poolside lounging and home-cooked feasts amid the sounds of  kookaburra birds and the rhythmic sea.

This contemporary oasis emphasizes the lush natural beauty of Australia’s easternmost edge. Designed and built around 3 age-old pine trees, it features ample outdoor living areas and broad doorways that breathe the dune-softened air. Enjoy a workout in the 20-meter lap pool or simply relax in the shallow lounge pool under the open sky. Make the most of the villa’s bicycles and paddle board, or curl up with a favorite book in the dappled afternoon shade. Kindle the barbecue in the evening and relish an alfresco meal with a bottle of Australian wine. 

The Northern Rivers region of New South Wales has something for everyone, from its extraordinary beaches, to the restaurants and cafes of Byron Bay town, to the history and panoramic views of Byron Bay Lighthouse. If you’ve never surfed before, this is definitely the place to try a first lesson, while skydiving and deep-sea fishing also beckon to thrill-seeking travelers. Explore the bohemian enclave of Nimbin and visit one of the area’s artisan and farmers markets. Nature-lovers will want to visit Broken Head Nature Reserve, Arakwal National Park,  and the Cape Bay Walking Track.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This enchanting villa is situated within steps of Mengening Beach on Bali's southwest coast, near the traditional village of Cemagi. Designed by architect Ernesto Bedmar (renowned for his private homes throughout Southeast Asia), the villa melds timeless Balinese elements with high-end modern comforts in exquisite harmony with the surrounding landscape. Resort-like amenities include two ample swimming pools (including a private pool off the master villa), expansive outdoor living and dining areas, and a fine professional staff, while the 5,900-square-meter estate offers a rare degree of privacy on this coveted coastline near Seminyak. Five private villas and a guest bedroom accommodate twelve guests in all, ideal for family reunions, large groups of friends, and destination wedding guests.

The estate overlooks sweeping vistas of the surrounding rice paddies, volcanoes, and ocean, with about 100 types of plants and trees inhabiting its luxuriant gardens. A two-story main pavilion opens to a 25-meter infinite swimming pool, accompanied by elegant lounge chairs and a poolside salon. The gourmet kitchen serves a semi-alfresco dining table, both enjoying expansive vistas. An interior spiral staircase and stunning two-sided exterior staircase lead to the upper-level terrace, featuring an ample covered living area and 360-degree vistas of the landscape and sea.

The 170-square meter master villa offers a honey-moon worthy escape for couples, with its own 9-meter infinite pool, furnished terrace, kitchenette, lounge, and deluxe ensuite bathroom. Each of the four guest villas features a private furnished terrace and ensuite bathroom with alfresco shower and tub, providing dreamy privacy for downtime and rest. The guest bedroom includes a king bed and direct access to a bathroom and terrace.

A minute's walk from Mengening Beach, Ambalama Villa balances privileged seclusion with proximity to some of the top destinations on Bali. The bustling scene at Seminyak is just fourteen kilometers away, and you're an easy drive to the iconic Tanah Lot Temple, an excellent site for wedding photos or family excursions. Golfers are close to Nirwana Golf Club, and surf pilgrims will want to visit Echo Beach. Cemagi and its surrounding countryside offer a rich taste of traditional Balinese life.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Don’t let the quaint exterior and 15-acres of orchards fool you, this masterfully-restored farmhouse, 13-kilometers from Queenstown, is a marvel of modern design. Relax in the hot tub and gaze upon lake and mountain views. Read by the fireplace while the kids play life-sized chess or petanque. Then, head to Queenstown for a night at the casino, a romantic dinner for 2, or a private yacht charter.

Follow 100-year-old Sequoia trees down The Homestead’s driveway to unveil a beautiful home outlined in rose gardens, lush lawns, and scenic landscapes. Inside, a thoughtful collection of furniture and art from around the World is sure to spark conversation at dinner parties. The state of the art kitchen is sure to inspire culinary creativity. And, the chandelier-lit dining area is the perfect scenic setting for an amazing meal.

After dinner, move the party to the living room and have the entertainer in your group play something on the piano. Then, move the party outside to sample the local wine in the floating fireplace lounge. On quieter evenings, explore the greenhouse, keep up with your workout routine in the exercise room, or hop in the swimming pool for a midnight dip.

In the morning, set out for an adventure on the Remarkables Mountian Range, home to World-class skiing at Coronet Peak, and golf at Queenstown Golf Course. For dinner, Skyline Queenstown offers incredible city and mountain views from its restaurant, Stratosfare. And for some action on the water, sign-up for sailing lessons at Wakatipu Yacht Club.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This superb luxury home enjoys a private estate within Mauna Kea Resort on the Big Island of Hawaii, with access to a wonderful array of resort and beach club amenities. Perched at a slight elevation amid lush gardens and palm trees, the villa gazes out on sweeping views of the Pacific Ocean and the famous sunsets of the Kohala Coast. Ample outdoor living areas include a swimming pool and hot tub, while the beautifully furnished interiors feature a full bar, gourmet kitchen, and ocean-view dining table. A fabulous master bedroom suite plus two superb guestrooms (one with a king bed, one with two twins) accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to six in size.

The villa's pool terrace and lanai invite you to savor the open-air pleasures of this famous Hawaiian coastline. Bask in the sunlight on comfortable lounge chairs and dip into the sparkling pool. Relish alfresco meals while gazing at the vast panorama, and linger outdoors amid the enchanting nighttime lighting, crawling into the hot tub for a soothing soak under the stars.

Wide thresholds join the terrace and the interior living areas, allowing the home to breathe the ocean air. The open-concept space includes a comfortable sunken lounge, a lovely bar, a table for games or drinks, and a dining table for eight with clear views of the ocean. The open kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and generous prep space. The house also includes excellent media features, a security system, and central air conditioning.

The master suite opens directly to the pool terrace and enjoys beautiful ocean views. Its ensuite bathroom includes a jetted bathtub set within a luminous niche. The other two bedrooms share a bathroom between them. Outdoor sitting areas, air conditioning, ceiling fans, and TVs create cozy private havens for all guests.

The villa is situated within minutes of world-class amenities at Mauna Kea Resort and Hapuna Beach Resort, including spas, swimming pools, tennis courts, and wonderful watersport options. Several world-class golf courses are within easy reach by car, and you're about twelve miles from Waimea.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

The Palms is a four bedroom beachfront luxury villa located on a private island just off the coast of Fiji in the Pacific Ocean. Vomo Island Resort is the only resort on the eighty-seven hectare island property. Surrounded by pristine sandy beach, crystal clear water, and shady palm trees, Vomo Island Resort is paradise. And, it’s yours to explore.

Vomo’s newest and largest villa, The Palms, is equipped with the most luxurious features imaginable. Four bedrooms, all with king beds, alfresco bathrooms, private terraces, and ocean views, are perfect for your family and friends. The shared spaces are the ultimate in open-air design. In fact, the line from indoors to outdoors merges so seamlessly, you may not even realize. The living room, dining area, and kitchen are combined in a spacious great room. The white vaulted ceiling and numerous openings keep it bright with natural sunlight, and full of fresh ocean breeze. Cozy designer furniture decorates the living area. Modern contemporary seating and a beautiful wood dining table, with space for eight, completes the dining area. And, high end appliances, sleek countertops and cabinetry, and a breakfast bar in the kitchen will encourage the aspiring chef in your group.

Surrounding The Palms, luscious tropical gardens, palm trees, and your own private beachfront. Integrated into the superb natural environment, The Palms terrace is a thing of beauty itself. Numerous lounge and dining areas provide guests with multiple settings to socialize or find solitude. Features inside include, television, Wi-Fi, a sound system, air conditioning, butler service, and daily laundry.

Take some time to explore the island and you will find The Reef Restaurant and a couple of beachfront bars where you can enjoy some local cuisine while you watch the sun set over the ocean. Spend an afternoon learning to snorkel, windsurf, or stand-up paddle boarding. Or, book a tee time at Vomo’s nine hole pitch and putt golf course, it’s a great way to explore the whole island.

listing.listing_description:
A pergola-topped deck and glassed-in great room command lake and mountain views from this modern retreat on 58 private acres at the heart of New Zealand’s North Island. Stretch out in a sun-dappled lap pool or soak in bathtubs hidden behind fern fronds. Or take advantage of the short drive to outdoor activities around Taupo and hike forested trails, cycle around the lake, and fish for local trout.

 

Look down on Lake Taupo’s Mine Bay from outdoor living areas with a swimming pool, lounging and dining areas, and a barbecue, then finish the day with a session in the al-fresco hot tub or in front of the indoor gas fireplace, sound system, and Wi-Fi. An espresso machine will fuel all your holiday adventures, and laundry facilities will help you start with fresh gear.

 

Fold back the glass walls on three sides of the great room to enjoy the luxury of one seamless indoor-outdoor living area. Wicker sofas and farmhouse-style ladderback chairs lend a rustic feel to the living and dining areas, while a vaulted ceiling gives the fully equipped kitchen a bright, airy appeal.

 

The two private bedrooms at this vacation rental are set on either side of the great room. Each one has a king bed, en-suite bathroom with a honeymoon-suite-worthy glassed-in tub, and access to a shared terrace; the master also has lake views.

 

The Point Villa Tatamoana is a 1-minute drive from the massive Taupo Maori carving, which towers over Mine Bay, and a short drive from Huka Falls, where Lake Taupo spills over in a rush of blue water. There are plenty of hiking and cycling routes in the area, or you can drive to downtown Taupo for a family dinner or a tasting at a local winery with friends.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Vaucluse is a suburb on the north-east peninsula of Sydney. With such quiet surroundings and privacy, you’d never guess that it’s just a six-minute walk to Parsley Bay Beach, and just ten-kilometers from downtown Sydney. It’s secluded atmosphere, and accommodations for twelve, are perfect for a family vacation or retreat with friends and colleagues. While you’re in Sydney, you’ll be located within minutes of so many of its world-famous attractions, making it easy to fall in love with this beautiful city.

Decorated mainly in white, this luxury villa uses light wood accents to create a simplistic, yet-chic environment within its open concept interior. With designer furniture, high-end electronics, and a breezy beach-inspired decor, it’s easy to feel at home in Villa Vaucluse. The living room features a generous couch, the dining table has seating for twelve, and there several more lounge areas, making it easy for guests to find places for group gatherings or break-off for more intimate occasions.

Outside, you’ll find several dining and lounge areas, both covered and open-air. Wi-Fi, cable television, air conditioning, a sound system, and washer/dryer are also included. And, the media room, billiard table, steam room, swimming pool, hot tub, ping pong table, and exercise room provide plenty of options for entertaining at home.

The star of Sydney’s iconic skyline, The Sydney Opera House, is a must-see while you’re in town. The rooftop patio of The Glenmore has a panoramic view of the harbor, and it’s a great place to enjoy a few cocktails, and a delicious dinner while you check out the sights. After dinner, hit the town and explore Sydney’s vibrant nightlife scene around The Rocks and King Street Wharf. If you’re traveling with children, Macquarie Lighthouse, the Royal Botanic Garden, and Taronga Zoo are all great afternoon destinations. And, there are several more pristine beachfront areas within ten kilometers of home.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Feel the breeze at this open-air, mid-century, modern home up the coast from Brisbane in Noosa. Stretch out on the sofa and enjoy garden views to either side. Lay back in a sun lounger and work on your tan while the kids splash in the pool. At night, fire up the barbecue and grill something fresh for dinner. If you’re in the mood to dine-out, check out the restaurants in downtown Noosaville. 

Doonan Glasshouse is set amongst lush lawns on a gentle down-slope leading towards mature trees. The house is an architect’s dream, combining a few simple ingredients to create something extraordinary. Atop a pristine slab of white concrete, floor-to-ceiling windows outline the Glasshouse’s perimeter, opening to scenic views on both sides. The interior is clean and modern, decorated with mid-century furnishings to add a natural, retro feel. After dinner, gather around the fireplace to plan out the rest of your evening. On nights-in, take a bottle of wine to the furnished pool lounge and watch the sunset. On quieter evenings, curl up in the media room for a movie.

The Sunshine Coast is home to a wide range of vacation activities, with everything from scuba diving to lavish afternoons at the spa. Start your mornings with a soothing stroll along Noosa Mains, Sunrise, or Yaroomba Beach. If golf is more your style, hit the links at Noosa Valley, Cooroy Mountain, or Peregian Golf Club. Later, check out the bustling craft beer scene on the waterfront of Noosa Heads. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Join Australia’s sailing elite in the prestigious Palm Beach neighborhood at this Italian-inspired home on Pittwater’s coast. Watch as sailboats navigate the scenic waterways from the upper-balcony. Sip your morning coffee while dangling your feet off the end of the private dock. Then, work on your tan 5 minutes away on the sandy shores of Whale Beach. You might even spot one.  

Featured in Vogue Living, Gaelforce is one of Pittwater’s most sought-after rental properties. Split across 4 levels, including a boathouse and scenic treehouse, there’s plenty of unique areas to discover, and views to capture. Follow the multi-leveled wood-deck terrace to find smaller enclaves, spaces for group gatherings, and access to the water. Inside, captivating works of art and designer furnishings are sure to spark conversation.  

On quiet nights in, watch a movie with the family on Smart TV or have a casual barbecue and relax by the pool. If you’re in the mood to host, turn up the sound system, mix a few cocktails at the wet bar, and mingle with friends as you explore the terrace walkways and dock seating area. For some time alone with that special someone, the Treehouse’s private balcony is a romantic setting with an inspiring bay view.  

The Palm Beach neighborhood has no shortage of pristine beachfront. Within a 10-minute drive, you’ll find yourself enjoying morning swims and moonlit strolls on some of Australia’s most desirable beaches. Another great way to get a lay of the land is on the scenic fairways of Palm Beach Golf Club. And, if you long for city life, downtown Sydney is just 42-kilometers south.  

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Windu Asri is an astonishing luxury villa on the southwest coast of the island of Bali. Situated just a ten-minute walk from Legian Beach and within minutes of Seminyak Square and Jalan Petitenget, the villa balances prime location with exquisite, cloistered privacy. Open-air living areas and six gorgeous bedroom suites evoke the splendor of centuries past, while contemporary amenities and deluxe services including a private chef and butler ensure total comfort. The villa can be rented alone or as part of the larger Windu Estate—an excellent choice for destination wedding guests or large family reunions.

The majestic villa invites you to enchanting days and evenings in the South Pacific light and air, with its ample, central swimming pool framed by beautiful furnished verandas and pavilions. The primary pavilion features an alfresco great room with soaring, vaulted ceilings of rich wood, an ample lounge area with sumptuous furnishings, and a superb dining table for twelve, ideal for relishing a barbeque meal prepared by the private chef.

Indoors, the spaces and décor are deeply elegant and serene, with beautiful furnishings and objets d'art evoking blending classical and modern Indonesian style. Prepare cocktails at the bar and savor them in the lovely lounge area with television, and gather around the dining room table with glass doors opening to the pool. In the morning, refresh your body with a trip to the well-equipped exercise room.

The villa features four fabulous king bedrooms and two guestrooms with two twin beds each (both convertible into kings), accommodating twelve guests in all. Each of the rooms opens to the villa's terrace and includes an ensuite bathroom with shower, television, safe, and air conditioning, among other deluxe features. The two primary king bedrooms additionally include stand-alone tubs in their bathrooms. The extraordinarily spacious and elegant bedrooms provide dreamy private settings for individuals and couples.

Beyond the heavenly seclusion of Windu Asri, you'll enjoy outstanding proximity to the area of Petitenget. Seminyake Square is less than two kilometers from your door, while the dining and nightlife of Jalan Petitenget is just a minute's walk away. The renowned temple known as Pura Petitenget is also within minutes, and golfers are within easy reach of the Greg Norman-designed Nirwana Bali.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Windu Asri can be rented as part of a larger estate, Windu Estate (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/indonesia/bali/petitenget/windu-estate-114865).

feature.p: Please Note: It's possible to walk the sands of Seminyak's Petitenget beach all the way to Kuta in the south, or north to Canggu. The beach is more popular with locals than tourists (not safe for swimming in most sections), but is a great spot for building sandcastles or to watch the sunset as you sip a cocktail from one of the many beachside bars.
